in anathuruwa kolambaa wishwa widyalaya, kalaniya wishwa widyalaya, ruhuna wishwa widyalaya saha wiwrutha wishwa widyalaya yana sarasawi hatharaka sanniwedanaya ha madhya adhyayana upadhi / diploma patamala menma paudgalika sanniwedana aayathana 29 ka patamala sanyojaka waraya wuwa pamanak nowa, janasanniwedana ithihasaya, rupawahinikaranaya, sinama, guwan widuli, puwath path kalawa, chayarupa shilpaya, jathyanthara prawruththi wani wishayayan arabaya sarawathma deshanaya pawathwana guruwaraya wuyeda ethumaya.

panadura sita dhawanaya wana siyaluma paudgalika bas rathawala sewakayin wisin aarambha kara thibu wada warjanaya sandaha thawath marga kihipayaka dhawanaya wana paudgalika bas ratha sewakayin ekwa thibe. ee sandaha aluthgama -kolambaa, kaluthara -kolambaa, mathugama -kolambaa saha moratuwa kolambaa yana margawala dhawanaya wana bas rathawala sewakayin da ekwa athi bawa lanka paudgalika bas himiyange sangamaya pawasayi. basratha sewakayekuta paharadimata wirodhaya pala karamin panadura sita gaman ganna paudgalika basratha dhawakayin ada(02) udasana sita warjanayaka nirathawa sitiyi. bas ratha sewakayata paharadun pudgalayin athadanguwata ganna thek warjanaya kriyathmaka wana bawa paudgalika bashimiyange sangamaye sabhapathi gamunu wijerathna mahatha sandahan karanu labiya.

ema pasubima yatathe sha්ri lankawe manawa himikam komishan sabhawe swadhinathwaya ha wyawasthanukula komishama wetha pawari thibena wagakim itu kirim walakwalimata karunu karana nodanna janathawa nomaga yawimata, adhikarana ha buddha shasana amathi wijayadasa rajapaksha karaliyata paminima ahambayak ho puduma wiya yuthu ho karunak nowe.

mewa ithin paribhogika sathkaraye durwalatha thamayi.wena bankuwaka ginumak nisa adala kad samagama samaga ginum thulanayata yam kalayak yanawa thamayi.habayi diyunu banku kramayakadi oyage paminilla handunagena niyamitha kalayak thula oyata sahimakata path wiya haki uththarayak laba denawa.mokada oyage paminilla eeka wisandiya yuthu mattamedi wisandanne nathiwa ihalata raporthu unoth eeka adala niladaringe rakiyawata balapana nisa.kendarakarayo banku wala thirana ganna lankawe samahara banku wala wage ohedith kastamar nodakin wenna athi !

tom malinowskige hiyumas rayits woch sanwidhanaya saha amarikanu rajaya athara pawathi dadi sabandathawa nobel sammanalabhinge saha eksath jathinge niladharinda wiwechanayata lak karanu labiya nobel sammanalabhi adolpe peras saha meriyan magusiri hitapu eksath jathinge sahakara maha lekam hams won eksath jathinge wishesha wimarshana richad polk athulu wishala pirisak tom malinowski manawa himikam pilibanda amarikanu sahakara rajya lekam lesa path wuye kesedayi amarikanu rajayen wimasanu labuwath eeta nisi prathichara labune natha.mewan athithayak athi tom malinowski sahakara rajya lekam lesa nam kale wathman amarikanu rajya lekam jon keriya.amarikanu praharawalin iraka saha apgan siwil wasiyan marumuwata path wana awasthawe amarikanu rajaya eeta wagakiwayuthu bawa prakasha kirimen walaki siti tom malinowski dan shri lankawata pamina aththe wanni meheyumedi sidu wu bawa kiyana yuda aparadha pilibanda wagakiwa yuththanta danduwam karana lesa illimataya.warak widyuth nalikawak samaga pawathi sakachchawakadi kiyana lada paridi wanni meheyumedi siwil wasiyan 40000 k miyagiya bawata nangena chodanawata sanatha kala yuthu wiya.eheth 2009 sita 2014 dakwa manawa himikam sasiwarayata sahabhagi wu shri lanka niyojitha kandayam siwil wasiyan 40000 k marumuwata path wu bawata ella wi athi chodanawata abhiyoga karamin miyagiya siwil wasiyan kawudayi heli karana lesa illa sitiye natha.meya pudumayak nowe. 2014 marthu masa jiniwa manawa himikam sasiwaraya pawathwena awasthawe shalawa thuladi rajya nowana sanwidhana kriyakarikayaku wu dewid wesli thama samipaye randi sitimin siduwana katha baha patigatha karana bawawath shri lanka kandayama danasitiye natha.esema wanni meheyumedi koti sathuwa thibi soyagath em. 16 ee praharaka awiwala amarikanu rajaya sathu bawa dakwena akuru satahan wi thibu bawada manawa himikam sasiwarayedi anawaranaya kirimata kisidu shri lankika niyojithayaku idiripath nowuni. 2013 jiniwa manawa himikam sasiwarayedi shri lanka niyojitha kandayama thunakata bedi kriya karanu labiya.

mathale disthrik anthar krida samaja “ech. em. silarathna” anusmarana kusalana sath samajika papandu tharagawaliye di 2009 wasare surathawa shashri lanka yuda hamudawe ukuwela gajaba rejimenthu krida samaja pilata himi wiya.80 dashakaye mathale disawen bihiwu daksha papandu kridakayeku wana abhawapraptha ech. em. silarathna mahatha samaramin ohuge mithuru kala warshikawa sanwidhanaya karana me tharagawaliya mewara 9 wani waratath pasugiyada mathale barnad aluwihare kridanganaye di pawathwini.me tharagawaliye dakshathama kridakaya lesa gajaba pile ke. yu. el. es. silwa saha dakshathama gol rakinna lesa ribels pile janaka senanayaka sammana labuha.kandayam 30 ka sahabhagithwayen pawathi me tharagawaliye pradhana aaradhithaya lesa nagarika sanwardhana amathya rohana disanayaka mahatha sahabhagi wiya.mehidi gajaba pila saha ribels pila athara pawathi awasan maha tharagaye di gol 2 – 0 ka jayak gajaba pilata himi wiya.

namuth ema pawule wala wiwrutha kirimata nam rupiyal 15,000/- mudalak thaman hata awashya bawa sewakayaku wisin ema kanthawata pawasa atha.thamanta ayath me wala wiwrutha kirimata etharam mudalak illima gana kalabalayata pathwu aya ee bawa thama putha wetha danwana ladi.ayage putha da susana bhumiyata pamina sewakayaku samanga katha kalada rupiyal 15,000k dena thek wala wiwrutha nokarana bawa danum dun pasuwa wala wiwrutha kirimata rupiyal 2000k saha shuddha karadimata thawath rupiyal 3000k labadimata ekanga wuwada sewakayan eya da prathikshepa kota atha.
namuth anawashya wiyadam sandaha nawa thanpath mudal waya kirima, naya mudal laba ganima siduwiya haka.
